Name: Dark Matter
About the game: Dark Matter recreates the excitement and frantic gameplay of the title that made history. In 1980, Asteroids was one of the most commercially successful games that helped to establish video games as a lasting entertainment medium. Now, embark on 30 various intergalactic missions in Campaign mode or opt to survive an endless attack in Challenge mode.
Meta Title: Dark Matter: Feb 27, 2015, Meridian4 and Full Overview
